name: Special Agent CyberDuck
description:
Developer Request:
Hey all, thanks again for downloading and playing Special Agent CyberDuck.
Just wanted to say, if you are enjoying the game it would be a huge help if you could watch a couple of Video Ads in the game (you get a reward for doing so). It really helps me out. I am a solo dev and I want to make games full time, so if you like the game and want to help out, please watch a few ads or you might even consider making an in-app purchase (there is the option to tip the developer, or buy a range of items to use in the game).

Thanks to everyone playing the game xo :D

Announcement:
We now have a Reddit Community!!! If you are stuck on a level, want to discuss the game or have any form of question, come and post on reddit.
https://www.reddit.com/r/cyberduckgame

Shout-Outs
• Massive shout-out to everyone playing the game and getting involved on social media, whether it's Reddit, YouTube, GameJolt, Twitter or any other platform. Your interactions help build community and make it more fun :D
• Also a big thank you to everyone that submitted a bug report.. You guys found some good ones, and you are helping make the game better. So thank you!!! :D
--------------------------

Gameplay Tips
• Game codes! (Try BLOOD). Whats that? You didn't find the Game Code screen yet? Have a look on the Player Settings menu. Want more Codes? You can search for them in the game. Or maybe check out the wiki (link below).
• Did you know that clues can reveal if a secret area is near? Small icons printed on the wall, floor or ceiling can indicate that somewhere around a secret can be found!
• Remember that secret areas may be below you. You may need to swipe down to drop down into the secret area (hint, hint... level 5) :D
--------------------------
CyberDuck… Wake up! We have a situation. A top-secret Artificial Intelligence has escaped containment and slipped into the network. Intel suggests the Rogue A.I has united the crime syndicates and taken over as leader. Its calling itself GODBOT. A crime wave is sweeping the city as GODBOT strives to take control!

Find GODBOT and DESTROY him.

Pixelart Platformer:
Special Agent CyberDuck is an action-packed pixelart platform game. CyberDuck and his team of Special Agents must run, jump and shoot their way through levels of fast-paced, explody mayhem. Defeat the minions, rescue the hostages, dodge obstacles, figure-out puzzle elements and ultimately confront GODBOT to beat the game! Then do it again on Suicide mode! Are you up for the challenge?

Whats that? You think you're the fastest? Prove it! Race the clock and post your Speedrun times to compete on Google Leaderboards!

Pixelart Platformer Action:
• Fight through action-packed levels filled with hostile thugs and meka bots. Blast them all!
• Epic Boss fights.
• Equip your character with multiple weapons. Quickly switch between weapons as the situation demands.
• Be sure to replenish your ammo, but fear not! You'll never be without a weapon with your trusty self-charging blaster at your side.
• Find secret areas containing powerups, loot and trapped hostages.

Unlock Characters, Weapons and Attributes:
• Equip New Weapons to level-up your fire power.
• Unlock Attributes to improve your player's fighting ability.
• Enlist new Special Agent characters with unique characteristics to help CyberDuck.

Features. Mix it up:
• Race the clock in Speedrun mode and compete for the fastest times on Google Leaderboards.
• Unlock Google Achievements as you progress and level-up.
• Enter game codes to unlock additional fun features.
• Multiple difficulty settings.. Start off easy, then crank up the difficulty for maximum challenge.
• Flexible control settings to suit a complete range of mobile devices.

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/cyberduckgame
Twitter: @lukasinspace
Fandom Wiki: https://cyberduck.fandom.com/
